name: OmniAI
headline: Automate document workflows
description:
Omni turns documents, slide decks, websites and more into the data you need. You'll never need to copy + paste data into spreadsheets again.
- Connect to a database or document store. We support Snowflake, Postgres, Google Drive, S3 and more.
- Transform your data - Define type safe schemas to run against your unstructured data. We’ll run those models against your data, and keep your warehouse in sync as new rows/fields are added/deleted.
- Query with SQL - All the transformed data stays in your warehouse. Surface this data in your product, or analyze with your existing BI tools.

founders.name: Tyler Maran, Founder
founders.description: Tyler is the co-founder and CEO of OmniAI. Before OmniAI, he played a pivotal role in developing AI and ML applications within the healthcare and mental health domains. His experience in establishing ML structures in stringently regulated sectors gives him a unique perspective on the tradeoffs of tech, business, and regulatory considerations.

founders.name: Anna Pojawis, Founder
founders.description: Anna is the co-founder and CTO of OmniAI, a data infrastructure layer for AI. Prior to OmniAI, Anna contributed to growth initiatives at Hightouch, a YC-backed reverse ETL company. She has a background in investment banking and graduated from the University of Connecticut.

# Automate complex document workflows.
Omni turns documents, slide decks, websites and more into the data you need. You'll never need to copy + paste data into spreadsheets again.
Book a demo
Try the API today
![Hero image](https://omniai-images.s3.amazonaws.com/omni-financial-hero.png)
![Logo list](https://omniai-images.s3.amazonaws.com/logo_list.png)
![Logo list](https://omniai-images.s3.amazonaws.com/logo_list.png)
## Save hundreds of hours byautomating manual workflows
See how OmniAI helps different industries.
Finance
Insurance
Compliance
E-Commerce
Product
![Case study icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Ffinancial-report.00a10610.png&w=96&q=75)
Earnings call analysis
Analyze earnings call transcripts to extract insights and sentiments, aiding in investment decision-making.
[Learn how](https://getomni.ai/</solutions/earnings-call-analysis>)
![Case study icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fcost.23e3aded.png&w=96&q=75)
Expense categorization
Automate the identification and categorization of expenses from financial statements to optimize budgeting and forecasting.
[Learn how](https://getomni.ai/</solutions/expense-categorization>)
![Case study icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fprofit-growth.73292586.png&w=96&q=75)
Financial reports extraction
Extract key financial metrics like revenue and COGS from financial documents for streamlined financial analysis and reporting.
[Learn how](https://getomni.ai/</>)
## Built for day to day workflows, or large scale automation
Get access to scalable infrastructure as easy as an API. All available within your environment’s virtual private cloud.
### Get started in a few lines of code
Create document pipelines for batch processing, extraction, and classification within minutes.
Read the docs
```

1from omniai import OmniAI
2client = OmniAI()
3
4response = client.document.process(
5 model="mistral-large",
6 document={
7"type":"pdf",
8"content":"account_statement.pdf"
9},
10 fields={
11  holdings:{format:"String"},
12  account_number:{format:"Number"}
13}
14)

```

![Transform data image](https://omniai-images.s3.amazonaws.com/summary_tool.png)
### Battle tested tools for top use cases
Utilize tools for summarization, sentiment analysis, classification, and extraction to ensure data is returned in a structured format.
Read the docs
## Access any of theindustry leading models
We keep up to date with the latest models so you don't have to.
![Case study icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/meta.e110ac90.svg)
Llama 3
Llama 3 by Meta offers improved accuracy, efficiency, and contextual awareness, making it suitable for advanced natural language understanding and generation tasks.
[Try now](https://getomni.ai/<https:/docs.getomni.ai/model-providers>)
![Case study icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/anthropic.6c092bc5.svg)
Claude 3
Claude by Anthropic emphasizes safety, ethical AI behavior, and context retention, excelling in generating coherent and user-friendly responses.
[Try now](https://getomni.ai/<https:/docs.getomni.ai/model-providers>)
![Case study icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/mistral.99ef4082.svg)
Mistral Large
Mistral Large is ideal for complex tasks that require large reasoning capabilities or are highly specialized - like Synthetic Text Generation, Code Generation, RAG, or Agents
[Try now](https://getomni.ai/<https:/docs.getomni.ai/model-providers>)
![Case study icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/amazon.24ee941c.svg)
AWS Titan
AWS Titan is designed for robust performance, scalability, and seamless integration with AWS services, excelling in complex natural language tasks for enterprise applications.
[Try now](https://getomni.ai/<https:/docs.getomni.ai/model-providers>)
![Globe icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/globe.33585a4b.png)
## Privacy you can trust
![security icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/password.25383524.png)
Private cloud
Our private cloud option allows you to maintain complete control over your data and infrastructure, ensuring the highest level of privacy and security.
![security icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/server.52e863a7.png)
OmniAI cloud
Enjoy the flexibility and scalability of cloud-based hosting while we handle the intricate details, ensuring your data remains protected in a secure environment.
![security icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/trust.d4979bcd.png)
Custom SSO
Tailor our security and operations overview to your unique needs, providing a personalized approach to safeguarding your sensitive information.
![security icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/market-research.5671c47b.png)
Audit logs
With detailed audit logs, you can track every action and access to your data, maintaining transparency and accountability to meet privacy and compliance requirements.
![security icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/secure.3958031a.png)
SOC 2 Type II
OmniAI is undergoing a SOC 2 Type II certification. Information on controls and procedures can be found in our [trust center](https://getomni.ai/<https:/app.vanta.com/getomni.ai/trust/r0mjyxrs6az8ordfkfihk>).
![security icon](https://getomni.ai/_next/static/media/data-modelling.5fc821a9.png)
Role-based acess control
Implement role-based access control to define and manage user permissions effectively. This approach ensures that only authorized personnel have access to specific data sets.
## Ready to try OmniAI?
Book a demo today and see how our solution can transform your workflow.
Book a demo
Learn more
Join the community
Join our Slack to connect with the Omni team and engage with our community.
Read our docs
Set up your environment and connect to our API.
OmniAI

generated_description:
OmniAI is a forward-thinking company established in 2023, driven by the mission to automate document workflows. They essentially take documents—whether they're traditional text files, slide decks, or even websites—and transform them into structured data, eliminating the tedious task of manual data entry into spreadsheets. Their tagline could be: "No more copy-pasting; let us handle your data."

### What They Do

At its core, OmniAI connects seamlessly with a variety of data sources, including Snowflake, Postgres, Google Drive, and S3, allowing users to pull unstructured data from multiple formats and locations. Once connected, users define type-safe schemas—think of these as blueprints for how to manage the raw data. OmniAI then runs sophisticated models against this data, ensuring that your analytics warehouse stays updated as the data evolves.

One of the standout features is its SQL querying capabilities. Users can query transformed data directly from their data warehouse, making it easy to integrate insights into existing BI tools or even live within products.

### Use Cases

OmniAI serves various industries, including finance and e-commerce, by automating tasks such as financial report extraction, earnings call analysis, and expense categorization. This means that complex documents can be rapidly transformed and analyzed, helping companies streamline their operations and make informed decisions faster.

### The Team and Their Backing

Located in San Francisco and currently boasting a small team of four, OmniAI was recently bootstrapped under the Y Combinator Batch W24. With Gustaf Alstromer as their Group Partner, the company is positioned to leverage Y Combinator’s extensive network and resources to accelerate its growth.

### Advanced Features

- **Multiple Data Sources**: OmniAI works with a variety of data storage solutions to simplify integration.
- **API Ease of Access**: Developers love the fact that setting up document pipelines requires just a few lines of code.
- **Robust Privacy Measures**: They emphasize strong data privacy protocols, including options for private cloud hosting and role-based access control.
- **Regular Updates**: The company stays at the forefront of technology by integrating the latest models for natural language processing, ensuring users have access to cutting-edge tools.

### Conclusion

If you're tired of the manual paperwork grind and want to scale your document workflows, OmniAI might just be the solution you need. By automating tedious processes and equipping businesses with real-time data, they're not just another tech startup—they’re redefining how we interact with our documents. 

For more information, you can visit them at [getomni.ai](https://getomni.ai).
